name: Stretch Fluid Foundation for Buildable Coverage
about: What it is:A hydrating gel-cream foundation that nourishes skin—for buildable, light-to-medium coverage with a natural-to-you finish..Coverage:Medium.Finish:Natural.Highlighted Ingredients:- Squalane and Glycerin: Hydrate and nourish skin’s moisture barrier..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This foundation truly puts your skin first with an 89 percent skincare base. Plant-derived squalane and glycerin hydrate and nurture skin’s moisture barrier while wild rose berry and plankton extract balance the look of shine. Amino acid-coated pigments fuse with your skin for flexible coverage in a wide variety of shades..Clinical Results:In a 2-week, third-party consumer study with 54 people between the ages of 18 and 69:

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake bottle to combine skincare base with amino-coated pigments. .-Apply one pump to clean, moisturized skin. .-Gently blend up and out with fingertips or buff and diffuse with Glossier’s Stretch Blending and Buffing Face Brush (sold separately) for a seamless finish. .-Use more product for extra coverage. .-Use with Stretch Balm Concealer (sold separately) for the ultimate complexion routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this foundation. I adore the stretch concealer especially as a light weight concealor that blended easily no matter what you used to blend. This foundation however did not work for me personally. Maybe I was using the wrong primer type or my skincare was off when I was using it. But it clung to my dry patches on my cheeks  and due to the lightness of the foundation made it very noticeable that it was doing so. Loved the more gel like consistency, and loved I found a foundation shade light enough for me — maybe too light even, but this was not it for me. Again, totally willing to say it was my skin type or my primers but if you struggle with clinging I’d for sure maybe weigh this foundation option against some other good ones that won’t have this affect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a few months now and I'm totally in love! I found my perfect match which is super hard to do. It stays on, the finish is not matte/cakey but also not oily and shiny. it's a perfect combination for oily skin and i love that the coverage is buildable. Only downsides is that it CAN transfer a bit if you dont set it (but who ISN'T setting liquid foundation already?) and that the pump is sort of getting stuck on me now that I'm running low on it. I'm not sure if I damaged it from using it so much, though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this foundation even tho it’s not really full coverage but it really works great if ur going for a glowy look 😊

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this foundation, the coverage is perfect with acne and has never broken me out as someone with sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this a couple of times. It is easy to apply and it has good coverage. Doesn’t feel heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation, it’s very lightweight and it’s the only foundation I have found that isn’t really yellow on me which is pretty lucky considering I guessed my shade when I ordered it (I don’t recommend guessing your foundation shade) but there are one thing keeping me from giving this 5 stars.  It’s a bit drying around the mouth and smile lines so it looks a bit crusty in those areas after talking a lot. I wouldn’t doubt that this would settle into forehead creases, but since I have bangs I don’t wear foundation of my forehead so I’m not certain. Also just a tip, it ends up looking  a bit patchy when applying with a brush. The easiest way to wear this foundation is putting 1 pump on the back of your hand and spreading it on your face with one of your fingers, then dabbing out to blend into the skin, when I was using a brush it resulted in some unevenness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this foundation for a couple of weeks now and really enjoying it! The color range is the best, a true neutral undertone for me. I find it to be buildable (light to medium) and I like to apply with a sponge on my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula. Behaves on the skin almost like a tinted moisturiser, gives a beautiful glow to my skin throughout the entire day, doesn’t move around or get cakey. Works perfect with my combination and acne prone skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this because I was happy with the lower price point and It’s my favourite foundation I’ve ever used! Buildable and the shade selection was great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was recommended and color matched in store for my young teenage daughter. She has both oily and dry skin. we requested something with light-medium coverage with a clean formula. The next day she applied and it looked dewy at first. within an hour, she looked like she had been in Florida all day. her face looked wet, shiny, melty. this was clearly not the right product for her. We will have to return this unfortunately.

reviews.review_title: Finally the perfect shade for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im very light with a yellow undertone. Most other foundations are slightly too pink or slightly too light for me. I see some people comment on the dry finish. Moisturizing properly beforehand is key. I LOVE it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my everyday foundation it beautiful and glowy, and lasts all day. I have tried ons of more expensive brands nothing compares to this. I am 40 and have normal to dry skin.

reviews.review_text: At first I didn’t love this product it took me a little while to get around it but after I started using it again I loved the coverage I also will say that I got the wrong shade therefore that was my error but it’s definitely worth it the coverage is good but also very natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It was ok, its perfectly nice, good coverage. But a little dry didn't give me that glow I was hoping for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited when Glossier came out with a foundation because their concealer is my all time favorite. But the finish on this is dry, and within a few months it was already separated.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your kit
reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: such an amazing product, so nourishing does not get cakey and is very well blend on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect buildable coverage. I mix with a moisturizer when I want sheer coverage or on its own when I want a bit more coverage. I typically apply with a dense brush and then a beauty blender overtop for a really beautiful skin-like finish. I have a lot of sensory issues when it comes to makeup, this foundation is weightless but still can provide coverage. I find that it can range from a skin tint like coverage (with moisturizer mixed in) to more of a medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I currently use the Glossier Concealer and used to wear the Skin Tint in G11, but I found it too oily and did not offer enough coverage.  When I heard about the Buildable Coverage Foundation, I was excited to try it. Unfortunately, it didn't work for my sensitive, rosacea- and acne-prone skin. Within a day of wearing it, I developed small pimples and experienced red, patchy, itchy areas on my cheeks. I took a break from using it for a few days, then tried it again with the same results, even though I didn’t change anything else in my makeup or skincare routine. I really wanted to love it, but sadly, it just didn’t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: best foundation ever!! literally so flawless and has such a nice skin like finish. it feels like nothing on my skin, super lightweight and good coverage! definitely part of my everyday routine.

reviews.review_text: i’m always getting compliments on my base and i accredit that to this foundation! it’s a skin like finish that can be easily manipulated into leaning more glowy or matte. medium coverage but can be sheered down or built up! it’s just so perfect and versatile!

reviews.review_title: Foundation that works for my combo skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always looking for the perfect foundation so I got a sample of this one from Sephora during my last visit so I could try before purchasing. I really like that it makes my skin look even toned (which it is not), hides redness from rosacea and seems to have staying power (lasted through a 10-hour workday). When I went to pick up the actual product, I double-checked with the Sephora representative to make sure that the color I had chosen was the right match. She told me it looked so natural she didn't think I was wearing foundation. So, if a natural (vs. matte or luminous) finish is what you're looking for, I'd give this one a try. For reference, I'm a MAC NC20 and got the 4 Light in this foundation. Also, my skin is combo with drier cheeks and oilier t-zone. I also have rosacea and this conceals it without aggravating it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You’ll love if you have dry skin! If it’s set it’ll last all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage is very patchy and I could not get this to blend properly. It kind of just sits on top of your skin. I’m a huge fan of their skin tint so this was very disappointing. ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to preface this by saying that this is my first foundation ever and i’ve been doing makeup for four years. This is mainly because I like the “natural” makeup and I thought foundation would make it a bit too much for me. But since I love glossier, and wanted to level up my makeup a bit I bought this. I have very bad sensory issues and bangs so I hate when i feel something gross on my face. This was very very light, it quite literally felt like nothing was on my skin I am not joking to you. The shade match was also beautiful. I am neautral toned but that was way too yellow for me in store so I got the cool toned one. The cool toned is still a tad yellow especially if you are a true cool tone shade. Other than that it’s very lightweight and holds up nice. It’s very pretty with more coverage on the medium side. It’s also not too glow or not too matte, perfect in the middle. It’s not drying or heavy or cakey either. It’s very gorgeous and natural if that is your thing. But i do think that if you are typically a certain undertone then you should go one undertone cooler. Overall this product is amazing for someone like me who prefers the natural makeup that feels very lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my skin is oily and this just melts off after a few hours, becomes very clumpy and patchy. I usually use the Armani luminous silk foundation which always stayed smooth on my skin. I switched to glossier to try and find a better match for olive skin, but the formula is terrible.

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation. It keeps my skin hydrated, doesn’t breakdown through out the day, and looks natural. It took a couple of tries to find the right shade. I’d recommend swatching in store.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely terrible. I have used Glossier Skin Tint and really liked it, thought this would be similar but offer more coverage.  I used G11 in the Skin Tint so was advised to get L2 in the Stretch Fluid foundation.  The colors are nowhere near similar. The L2 was very orange and not neutral at all.  The formulation itself is greasy and burned my eyes and skin within a minute of applying.  I had to remove it immediately.  This is a big no for me.

reviews.review_text: This is my new go to foundation! I am over 40 and it doesn’t crease or have too much of a matte finish. It has a natural look, feel light on the skin, and one pump is all I need for my face and neck.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for people who like dewy makeup!

reviews.review_text: I prefer a more natural radiant look over matte and this foundation has proven to be perfect. It feels lightweight and natural like a second skin. Foundation often makes my skin feel grimy and this does not do that

reviews.review_text: I have been on the search, on the hunt to find the right foundation for my skin (combination skin that runs on the dry and dull side). My housemate uses this and has always had glass skin so I thought I would give it a shot. Let me TELL you that I have never gone back to before. I love this foundation so much and have purchased it multiple times. I highly recommend and it goes so nicely with all of my other products. My skin has never looked better. Thanks glossier! Mwah

I can always count on Glossier to make a great product with clean ingredients! The Stretch Fluid Foundation is definitely my favorite Foundation I have tried so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: easily one of my favourite foundations! i have dry, sensitive skin and this foundation doesn’t separate or cling to any dry spots, especially with the right skin prep. i like to add a few drops of the Drunk Elephant B-Goldi Bright Drops to mix with this and i have dewy, healthy skin all day long! it’s mostly a light to medium coverage foundation, but definitely buildable. i get compliments on how good my skin looks with this. it does seem to work better with more water-based primers than silicone in my experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This forumula works well with water-based products I use and makes pores appear smaller. Half a pump mixed with the Glossier Future Dew Serum is all I needed to get even coverage on my whole face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The finish of this foundation is pretty. However, it broke me out by the end of the day. I have adult acne prone combination skin. Wanted to love it.

reviews.review_title: Best Foundation I’ve Used in My Whole Life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine lines, laugh lines, smile lines, huge pores, and a dehydrated skin (oily yet dry), and this foundation solves 100% of those problems. I don’t even bother to use a primer for this because I’m of the school of thought that a well - formulated foundation shouldn’t need any help to last, but that’s just me!  Anyhow, this foundation makes my skin completely flawless, and I mean Flaw.Less. I’m 40, yet it gives me the same skin condition that I had when I was in my 20s. Smooth, line - free, plump, and  poreless skin. The result still looks fantastic even after 12 hours of wear, without any patchiness, cracks, or oiliness that makes one’s pores look like holes, because the foundation moves with my facial movements!  Glossier’s “Stretch Foundation” is amazing; I apply it with my fingertip, pat on the “Stretch Concealer” after, and top of all off with their “Wowder” Finishing Powder.   I’ve noticed, too, that over time, the results became long - term. For example, now even after I’ve washed all of my makeup off, my skin is still plump with minimized lines and pores. It’s also gotten very soft, too!  For reference, my foundation shades are NARS “Santa Fe,” MAC “NC20,” and anything else with the words “Buff” or “Vanilla” in the name, and my Glossier foundation and concealer shades are both “Light 1.”

reviews.review_title: Love this foundation. Soothing with good coverage.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, one of the few I’ve actually repurchased. I have very sensitive combination skin and this doesn’t cause breakouts or irritation. I’d say it has a medium coverage that can be built up. The finish also isn’t matte nor dewy, somewhere in between.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is lightweight and medium coverage! Ive had it for 3 months and haven’t broken out :”) I also suggest mixing in a dew gel, like the Saie, to thin it out since it’s quite thick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously wondering why this is an average of 4.1 stars because it’s a 5 for me!! Amazing matte coverage that lasts all day! Not patch at all. Medium buildable coverage they goes on so smooth and even. A win for me!! My new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this last year, and it’s just been sitting in my makeup drawer and I will likely never wear it again. I waited too long past the return time to return. I never write reviews, but just wanted to say this foundation is cakey and makes my skin look super dry. I find it very thick. I’ve tried prepping my skin in various ways and have tried various different sponges & brushes and no matter what I do it never looks good. I do absolutely love the stretch concealer though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t really like. It did not sit well on my skin at all and I have combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin, and I've tried a number of foundations. I'm so glad I finally found the one. It doesn't dry me out during the cold months, and it makes my skin...glow. This and the stretch balm concealer are perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, it is so beautiful and hydrating. Perfect for those lighter makeup days. Thinking about getting another shade for the winter time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried everything to try to get this foundation to look good. I've tried with and without primer, different levels of moisturizer beforehand, different amounts of product, applying with a brush and with a sponge (both damp and dry). No matter what, it always looks the same. It emphasizes pores and fine lines and clings to even the tiniest bit of dryness (I don't even have very dry skin overall, just a few places that are on the drier side). It just looks patchy and weird, like its sitting on top of my skin rather than blending into it. It also transfers really easily. It's bad enough that I would never wear it in public. I've given up trying to make it work and am just going to throw it away. I don't have a lot of money to spare so this was a huge waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, sits nicely and undetectably on skin and very natural. It has a  glowyish satin finish. I have oily acne prone skin and this does not break me out.  separate if you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Glossier girlie for life… but this foundation leaves my skin looking crusty. Not moisturizing at all. Patchy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this looked cakey and honestly patchy, no matter how much primer I put on. reviews.review_title: Love this foundation & the gorgeous natural finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

I don’t have many skin imperfections so for me this type of coverage works great! But I have to say, this foundation isn’t super long wearing. With a proper primer + setting the foundation, it lasts about 4-5 hours on my combination skin. I have shade M4

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start my review by helping with the shade description and comparisons, as I look for these reviews myself when buying complexion products!  First off, I immediately noticed that Glossier goes VERY light, and also that this particular shade (very light 1, described as neutral), is not a yellow-based shade. I am unsure whether it’s a true neutral or simply NOT a warm-leaning neutral (which is often the default for brands!), but I think some of you will be very pleased to discover this. If you know you are a cool or warm undertone, I would recommend opting for the shades described as such. If you are purchasing this for light coverage, note that you will have more flexibility in a less-than-perfect shade match as it can be worn as a tint.  As far as use, first off, don’t make the mistake I did. It’s not a twist lid - simply pull to reveal the pump. If you see a stick, you’re looking at the pump’s mechanism instead (lol). The product spreads very easily regardless of how you apply: brush, fingers, sponge. One pump is enough to get a bit of coverage but still not look like you’re “wearing foundation.” In terms of coverage, this product really does feel in-between a skin tint and a light coverage foundation. I do prefer this for light coverage, but it can indeed be build up. Multiple pumps did start to feel heavy on my skin, personally. I also found that I did prefer to set this with powder as it is not a self-setting skin tint.  When I opt for one pump, this wears nicely on my dry skin without settling into lines or showing texture. I do not have oily skin, but I suspect oily skin types would also prefer setting this with powder as otherwise it is a bit dewy/shiny.  Overall, I would say I am impressed with the shade range and appreciate that the product is as described!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy it is to use this incredible fluid foundation. It really gives my skin a light to medium coverage and it gives my skin a very natural beautiful finish, which I really love. I love how it is also very blend to my skin tone, and it looks so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful bottle and beautiful foundation, loving the look and the shade is exactly my match, consistency is perfect for foundation and I was able to use it with beauty blender not much soaking was there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This skincare foundation is perfect for those days I want to get ready quickly, without many steps or layers. This product makes my skin look glowy, youthful and hydrated. I do not even have to use a moisturizer beforehand. Such a unique foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful skin like finish . Does not leave unwanted texture on the skin. Super easy to blend. I was easily able to choose the perfect color via online options. My skin looks amazing . Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg i love this foundation a little goes along way One pump on moisturized skin and blend with my fingers and done For extra coverage u can add more its buildable formula Just remember to shake will before applying to get all the benefits and coverage Definitely recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who loves a natural foundation look, this is perfect for that! Plus it has skincare ingredients in it. Huge plus! It’s light but buildable without it being cakey or heavy. It’s not drying. It doesn’t make me oily or greasy. This is a wonderful foundation,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a great foundation that looks amazing and lasts all day. I love this foundation! The coverage is incredible and it stays put until I take it off, and leaves me looking natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a HUGE glossier fan (like literally love Glossier so much) and knew this foundation would be amazing! It’s a great amount of coverage (more than their skin tint) but still looks light and natural! I love how buildable of a formula it is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a type of foundation that feels like skincare, it actually provides moisture and nourish to the skin.I felt my skin more hydrated after applying it. It is very natural and lightweight. What makes this foundation stand out is the ingredients that make the skin healthy and young looking.I only applied once and no need to retouch. It lasts longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am completely blown away by this foundation’s  performance! It blends into the skin seamlessly and gives such a natural beautiful coverage on the skin. It looks like my skin, but better. It sets nicely with powder and layers well over moisturizer, and with blush and contour as well. This doesn’t settle into my fine lines or wrinkles at all, and it gives my face a healthy glow. My pores appear minimized, and this foundation doesn’t feel heavy at all. This is my new favorite foundation, and I’m so happy it came into my life. I honestly can’t think of a single drawback to this foundation. I will say that it applies better with fingers or a sponge rather than with a foundation brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: GLOSSIER: Stretch Fluid Foundation is perfect for my textured skin! I love how perfectly it blends out and doesn't settle in fine lines or ache spots. It has great coverage and doesn't cause me to break out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The finish on this foundation is beautiful, It’s truly a your skin but better kind of foundation. It’s very lightweight on the skin and buildable, I get why they call it the stretch fluid foundation, It kind of stretches with your skin in a way. A little goes a long way with this product, I normally use 2-3 pumps of foundation but I only needed one pump of this for my preferred coverage. It was comfortable on the skin and wore well through out the day without creasing or wearing away! I also love that it didn’t have any scent to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down my new favorite foundation. My skin is on the dryer side especially during winter and this foundation sits beautifully on my skin without accentuating dry patches. Since it’s a lighter formula I expected it to start breaking up around my nose but no it lasted all day! Absolutely in love with this product and I will continue to use repurchase.

I had a lot of hesitation about this foundation, but once I tried it, I’m in love. The shade in the bottle looked like a good match, but when I watched on my hand in the sun, it seemed like the foundation will be way too dark. I still went ahead and applied it to my face and while it is not a perfect match for my winter skin, it is very very close, and I can easily wear it now. It was easy to, and it blended without any problems. This foundation gives a natural finish and solid medium coverage. I had no issues applying the rest of my makeup products on top of it. This foundation wore well throughout the day and didn’t feel like I am wearing anything.

reviews.review_title: I just found my holy grail .
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light 2 was nearly a PERFECT shade match for my light skin with neutral undertones. No issues with oxidizing. I like the packaging a lot  and love the formula. It’s thick but blends out beautifully with a damp beauty blender. The formula has a natural finish and blends fairly easily with no issues pilling with other makeup and skincare.  The formula is buildable but has light-medium coverage. I didn’t breakout after using and no scent detected. I wore out in the rain today and it seemed to hold up really well. Honestly not understanding the negative reviews. I love it. Not to be dramatic but I think I just found my favorite new foundation. I currently have combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who prefers a natural makeup look on a daily basis, this is a great foundation choice.  My foundation matched my skin tone nicely and this gel-cream based foundation easy to apply.  My skin has an even tone.  I give this foundation a thumbs up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Stretch Fluid Skincare Foundation and I absolutely love it. It gave my skin buildable, light-to-medium coverage with a natural finish. The combination of hydrating ingredients like squalane and glycerin nourish the skin, while wild rose berry and plankton extract balance shine. The amino acid-coated pigments blend seamlessly with the skin for a flexible and personalized coverage. This foundation is a must-try for a radiant and natural-looking finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good foundation option when you aren’t looking for a full coverage look and if you have mature skin like myself.  It really does stretch with your skin so you don’t feel like you’re wearing foundation. I do think it’s also buildable in coverage but it becomes thicker feeling than the fluid feeling you get with one layer. Overall I really like this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing everyday foundation. I find the coverage is light but buildable to medium. I love how skin like it looks and I find the best application to be with my fingers then finished with a brush.  Be sure to give it a good shake prior to application to mix all the skincare with the pigment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t heard this glossier foundation talked about so much, so I was excited to try it for myself. It definitely gave me much more coverage and felt a lot thicker then I was expecting. Definitely emphasized the texture in my skin which I didn’t love, but could be good for spot-concealing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation. It has a matte finish yet you can sheer it out for a light coverage if you want which is rare for a matte foundation. It is also buildable to a medium coverage. I am very pale and I could find a shade that suits me which is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really liked this at first. The coverage is buildable and feels so light. The finish was gorgeous as well so I’ll be using this for shorter days. However I wore it for a full work day (11 hours) and I just don’t think it was built for that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks really nice on my skin. It applies smooth, doesn't sink into my pores or fine lines, and doesn't separate on my skin. Coverage is medium, but definitely buildable. A nice formula for everyday use. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Glossier Stretch Fluid Foundation is a lightweight, buildable formula that delivers a dewy, natural finish. It provides seamless coverage while maintaining the skin's natural radiance, perfect for achieving a fresh and effortless look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for this post. I recently tried the Glossier liquid foundation and I have to say, it's easily become one of my favorite makeup products. The first thing that stood out to me was how beautifully it blended into my skin. The formula is lightweight and buildable, allowing me to achieve the perfect amount of coverage without feeling cakey or heavy. Not only does this foundation provide a flawless, natural-looking finish, but it also has great staying power. I found that it lasted throughout the day without needing touch-ups, making it perfect for long wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love how lightweight and medium to full coverage this foundation can be, this can be my skin tint and feels like i have nothing on my skin. It really does look like skin foundation which i love. This shade also matched perfectly for me as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite thing about this foundation is the coverage. It gives me just the right amount to hid my blemishes but not feel super heavy. It also is transfer resistant based on my test! It goes onto my skin very smoothly and blends in very easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great every day foundation, especially for the great price!! The packaging is cute and the foundation performs well. It stuck to my dry patches the first time I applied it, but now I make sure to exfoliate and use a good moisturizer (which I should be doing regularly regardless) and my base ends up looking nice and smooth. I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gifted by BosleyMD to try out. I seen a noticeable difference how my hair looks. I can’t wait to see more about the product how it looks in the next couple months. I’m truly excited to see how this product works

reviews.review_title: down a star, its not insane wow, but also not boo

Blend-ability? A++, the amount you get for the price, in this economy is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Overall, love the glow and hydration but it’s definitely on the lighter coverage side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this foundation. It provides great coverage without being too heavy. My skin leans on the drier side, and this worked really well with a good primer. It didn’t emphasize any dryness or sink into creases. The shade match was spot on and I can’t believe how perfect the shade is on me. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I love how seamlessly it’s smooth on my skin and you could barely tell I had it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I love that this foundation is 89 percent skincare so that I don’t have to worry about breaking out from makeup! It is so lightweight with a buildable medium coverage. I reach for this a lot for my no makeup days as it gives my skin a super natural, and healthy glow. I have finally found a long wearing foundation that looks like skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve owned this foundation before and I love it! I love how even it makes my complexion and it brings this healthy radiance. It does not feel Cackey or heavy on my skin. I have dry skin, so this natural foundations works perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly a great foundation I love the buildable nature of it! I would say prep is really important cause if you don’t it could cling on to dry patches but so does every foundation! Overall I didn’t have issues with oxidation and it sat very pretty on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the consistency of this foundation, it's a gel cream consistency thats thick enough to properly cover the skin. It's builadable so you can have medium to full coverage as well. I have dry skin and it doesn't cling to my dry patches nor does it cake.

reviews.review_title: Too patchy and didn't set well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely tried my best to like this foundation, it was possibly one of the ones that did not suit my skin at all. I attempted it with a good skin prep and other methods and it just did not work at all. The application was patchy and it did not set well either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is really nice and I love how it makes my skin glowy and natural looking.  I like the gel cream texture and it’s easy to blend with my fingers or brush.  It lasts all day without breaking down.  I highly recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful foundation that works extremely well for my combination skin. You can apply it in layers. It makes my skin brighter, moisturized and beautiful. I would highly recommend it to everyone to try it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Glossier stretch liquid foundation is so perfect for my skin! A lot of of my current foundations does not work for me this winter because it’s so cold and dry. This foundation I find is way more hydrating and gives my skin the moisture that it needs to look flawless even when the weather is this cold.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Stretch Fluid Foundation is a really beautiful everyday foundation. It has a gel-cream consistency that blends out easy and seamlessly. It’s more of a light-medium buildable coverage. Great to hide imperfections and even out the skin. This is especially great if you have dry skin and it gives a pretty, natural, radiant finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Non irritating and nice consistency, but it clings to dry patches. At least for me. Maybe this will be better in the summer for me.

reviews.review_title: Good for dry skin but needs a good primer

The color is a great match for medium olive skin. However, due to the gel cream texture, it can get cakey around my chin very fast and can also settle into lines if not set properly. Using a smoothing primer underneath is a must with this. I've used this throughout the winter and it is very comfortable to wear. I would definitely recommend giving this a shot if you can find your shade, especially if you have dry skin. Just make sure to prep well beforehand.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful finish for lght-med coverage foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I want to like this and I just don't. I was looking for something a little lighter and the beauty advisor had me convinced when we were doing color matches she suggested this as I was looking more for medium coverage and something not so heavy. I even got the moisturizer and primer she suggested to go along with it. Makes my skin feel oily, breaks apart, and just doesn't last on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin

I bought it because I wanted something with a lite more coverage than a skin tint but less coverage than my other foundations, and this fits that exact build. Not overly dewy and I haven't had issues with transfer when I set with translucent powder. Overall I really like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

I am still giving it more chances and I do believe it may have been an error on my end to use the right primer with this.

reviews.review_text: The shade was very good match to my face. It went on pretty smooth. My only complaint is that it is a light coverage. I prefer a medium coverage foundation than light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation i have tried and I have dry and sensitive skin. Its buildable, and I love the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my FAVORITE foundation ever !! it’s so good and doesn’t cling onto my dry patches

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

THIS lightest shade in the range is PERFECT. I have very dry skin, all foundations tend to cling to my dry spots this, glides right on and looks STUNNING.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product literally just sits on top of my skin. It clings to all the dry portions of my skin and when I wear it, I look like I’ve put 20 pounds of foundation on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product without taking a look at the reviews (which is unlike me, but I’m so glad I did). I liked the coverage and texture trying it in store and decided to give it a shot. I really like it! I have oily skin, large pores, and acne scars (a foundation’s nightmare) but this one works well with my skin! It wears beautifully and it gives great coverage. I now use this as my everyday foundation, and I will definitely be repurchasing. I docked one star as I don’t think it’s 100% perfect - i do have to blot later in the day but that’s just due to my skin type. Would love for them to come out with a combo/oily skin version of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks very skin like covers acne beautifully without irritation and lasts all day when set

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It's definitely on the thicker side but I like it. On days I want it thinner I mix the Saie glowy super gel and it lasts so long even without setting powder or spray. Amazing coverage! The finish w/ the Saie is literally like a filter for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade was not a good match for me but I decided to apply a full face anyway to see how it set into my skin. My skin is exfoliated and moisturized and I made sure to use a water based primer but within minute of applying it it looked very flakey and made my skin look dry. I was initially going to return it and try another shade but I think I will keep looking for a new foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to foundation has been Estee Lauder Double Wear 2N2 Buff but as I age, it's been too drying on my skin, especially in winter. I asked a beauty advisor what she would recommend and she said Glossier.  I was skeptical, but I took it home and tried it.  The color match was spot on and it blended so nice with a foundation brush.  I used one small pump for my whole face and it even covers my redness. The finish is dewy and natural, and I can use it close to my eyes so I use less concealer. It's not as transfer proof as Estee Double Wear, but it does seem to stay on all day without touchups and the finish is just better for mature skin.  I might use an oil blotting sheet once a day on my t-zone. Two bonuses: price point is way better and Glossier is cruelty free, yay!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too thick and heavy feeling on my skin type. I think someone with dry skin might get along better with this one. Color match was good for me but just too greasy after a few hours of wear

reviews.review_title: this product is SO worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i struggle finding foundations i like but THIS is it!!! it’s very buildable and blends like a dream, and my other products sink into it very nicely. this lasted me a whole school day + a 3 hour audition w dance in one day- over 14 hours!!! if you like lighter coverage this is it, and for foundation it’s very decently priced!!! will be buying again <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love love LOVE this foundation. It's the only foundation I can use that actually covers acne and blemishes while still looking like my skin, so I don't need to apply bronzer or contour in order to use this. it's perfect for everyday and since I spend less time on my base I can spend more time on my eyeshadow and eyeliner, really couldn't recommend this enough! it has such a flawless finish. it's giving glam without having to put in the work! I apply this to my face with my fingers and blend out with a beauty blender, then I set with the Kim chi powder. my foundation shade is medium tan 3 and I use the glossier stretch concealer in medium 2 for under my eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great finish, but my acne prone girlies stay away. This foundation is NOT acne safe whatsoever:( I loved the finish so much but it broke me out so bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Once I prepped my skin then added the foundation it lasted all day and looked flawless, also felt like I wasn’t even wearing it. Love it a lot and color is spot on

reviews.review_title: Looks like skin—if you use it right
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially, I wasn’t sure if I liked this foundation. It would look great upon application, and then halfway through the day, it’d really start to emphasize my skin texture and look awful. I decided to start using only one pump for my whole face, and now it looks great all day with great coverage and finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Read positive reviews of this product so I was excited to try. Unfortunately it does not blend well. Very cakey and did not go on smooth. Excellent color options but not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for two months consistently, I can confidently say that it’s my go-to foundation for every occasion! Highly recommend for light - medium coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this product. it is such an everyday wear. i wear it in the winter, summer, all seasons. its very lightweight and nicely covers everything without flakes, looking oily or anything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been on the hunt for a good lightweight, light to medium coverage foundation. I tried makeup forever and also rare beauty but surprisingly THIS foundation came out the winner. Works well over my moisturizer and super goop sunscreen and is buildable. It has a really decent lasting finish considering I went to the gym & sweat in it. Definitely giftve it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The most excellent color match in both my winter n summer shades but just fades off my face in under four hours. I am an oily girl but it just slipped off my face in a very abrupt n odd way, never had a foundation just disappear. Coverage disappeared as well obviously

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I typically use glossier skin tint & thought I’d try this out. I didn’t think I was going to fall in love! This is definitely going to give you more coverage (I still like less coverage so I use one pump for my full face) and I have flawless skin after!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very thick and does not blend into the skin. And with as thick as it is, you’d think it would cover some blemishes.  It is so shear! Covered nothing and looked streaky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Litellary horrible. Clumps up on skin. Absolutely wouldn't recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! The shade match was perfect (I have light skin with neutral warm undertones), and it made my skin look flawless. I have VERY dry skin, and this doesn't cling to dry patches or emphasize my texture at all. I find that a little goes a long way. Even the packaging is adorable. Well worth the price. Will definitely repurchase and strongly recommend!

reviews.review_title: perf shade match but gave me whiteheads
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i rarely get acne from beauty products & have never gotten from the glossier skin tint, but after applying this product i got so many whiteheads on my chin & cheek area, after looking @ other reviews i’m glad i’m not the only one!! it also clung to the dry patches of my skin

reviews.review_title: My base looks so bad every time :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My base has never looked so horrible. I tried this foundation twice to give it a fair shot but I hated my makeup both times. It clings to all my dry spots around my mouth and creases in my smile lines terribly. I don’t usually mind smile lines cause they’re natural and I smile a lot so it’s inevitable, but it’s so bad with this foundation. My go-to drugstore foundation performs better than this and it’s much cheaper too. Here is a picture I took after wearing this foundation for just 4-5 hours. I’m baffled that this foundation looks so horrible in such a short time.

reviews.review_title: I love Glossier but this just wasn't for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have acne prone skin do not get this! it has a lot of oils in it that broke me out so bad I thought I needed to go to the dermatologist but the minute I stopped using this I was back to normal. Not mad just wish the ingredients were marketed a little heavier just so I wouldnt have wasted the money on buying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product just sits on top of the skin and looks bad. The color matching is tricky since it changes after oxidizing a few minutes post application.  It's giving 2003 drugstore vibes with a 2023 luxury price.  if you are in the market for a luxury foundation, it's not worth the price. I recommend trying a more reputable brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It matched my skin tone really well and it feels good on the skin but the way it settles is not good. I have dry skin but I usually don’t need to worry about texture as I have pretty clear skin but the way the way It enhanced my pretty minimal fine lines and pores was crazy to me as I’ve never experienced it before, but maybe it was just my skin. It settles and I had mini bumps all over but not itchy or any rash just breaking out disappoint

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo heavy! I felt like I had to blend forever until it looked somewhat smooth but even then it magnified my pores and every texture on my skin. After I removed it my skin was really red and irritated. :(
